testExamplesDescription: Try these questions to test the smart assistant's capabilities

instructions.step1: Type your question or request in the text box
instructions.step2: Press Send or Enter to get the answer
instructions.step3: Use quick buttons for common questions
instructions.step4: For shipment tracking, enter the trip number directly
